El Na Refa Na La – Jewish Get Well Healing Prayer Card

Best Deals! El Na Refa Na La – Jewish Get Well Healing Prayer Card – Get Well Cards This item is trending! El Na Refa Na La – Jewish Get Well Healing Prayer Card good product El Na Refa Na La – Jewish Get Well Healing Prayer Card You can read more about itThis famously short but heartfelt biblical prayer for healing comes from the book of Numbers, in Parshat Beha’alotecha. Moses offers this five-word prayer on behalf of his sister, Miriam: El na refa na la, “O God, please heal her.” Inside reads "Refuah sheleimah" in Hebrew and "Wishing you a speedy and complete recovery" in English. Price:$5.02
